thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 5 of 457
thread.title: Mary Ramirez

author: Mary Ramirez
title: Mary Ramirez
text: I have been working with Jenn Linden for a couple weeks now, so when I arrived to purchase the vehicle she came out shook my hand and was by far very personable she made me feel as we had known each other our whole lives. She completed the paperwork and introduced me to Robert in which he had sold my brother and wife their car a couple of years ago he greeted them and thanked them for referring me to you guys. A big thank you to Jenn for her awesomeness!!!!
